Name: Fantasy Adventure
About the game: Let's start a war of invasion. The story is set on an island in the Pacific Ocean. Players need to use guns to kill monsters, Main goal - kill as many monsters as possible. Game features: First person real experience Fast paced battle You can do: --Left mouse button aiming shooting --Right click to load --Control your ammunition --Ammunition shortage --Protect yourself and destroy them
